dct_title_s: Map of the principal quartz and gravel mines in Tuolumne County, California
dct_description_sm: by J.P. Dart, Mining Engineer ; A. L. Bancroft & Co. Lith. S.F.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows drainage, township and section lines, mining claims, land ownership, ditches, roads and trails.
Illustrations of trees: white oak, scrub pine, black oak, red pine, fir, sugar pine.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
